title: Construction Indonesia 2025: A Hub for Innovation and Sustainable Building Solutions
body: Construction Indonesia 2025, marking its 25th anniversary, will focus on building materials and technology, expanding its scope to include smart and sustainable solutions for infrastructure and residential projects. The event, held alongside the Concrete Show South East Asia, aims to foster collaboration among industry players and showcase innovations in building materials, technology, and construction machinery.

title: International Industrial Week Indonesia 2025: A Platform for Industry Collaboration and Growth
body: PT. Meorient Exhibition International is hosting a series of pre-exhibition activities for the International Industrial Week Indonesia 2025, focusing on strengthening industry networks and business opportunities. The event, featuring key stakeholders from various sectors, aims to foster collaboration and provide access to quality suppliers, with plans for relevant conferences addressing national issues.
